2019 warshaye janawari masa 01 wani dina weralabada polis wasame jampata widiye di malkam yana ayata wedi thabimata thathkirima, kumanthranaya kirima, aadhara anubala dima yana chodana sambandhayen wana naduwa. 2019 warshaye janawari masa 20 wani dina weralabada polis wasame jinthupitiye antani kaෲs yana ayata wedi thaba ghathanaya kirimata thath kirima, kumanthranaya kirima, aadhara anubala dima yana chodana sambandhayen wana naduwa. 2019 warshaye pebarawari masa 14 kotahena polis wasame maithri bodhiraja mawathe di aasha farik yana kanthawata wedi thaba ghathanaya kirima, kumanthranaya kirima, aadhara anubala dima yana chodana sambandhayen wana naduwa.

ee haraha tharuna kridakayanta idiriyata paminimata awasthawak athi bawa arawinda sandahan karayi. 1996 wasare loka kusalanaya dinu shri lanka kandayame wirayeku wana arawinda wishrama ganimen pasuwa shri lanka krikat aayathanayath ha sambandha wi wiwidha aakarayata siya dayakathwaya labadunneya.
ek athakin apurwa wana saundaryayak parisarayata ekathu karana me kundalakara shaka wishesha ihala protin agayak sahitha aahara poshanayak washayen da handunagena thibe.
